amendment.description: An amendment expressing the sense of Congress that the President and Permanent Representative to the U.N. should encourage the U.N. to establish a commission to study establishing a revolving headquarters for the U.N. and to establish the U.N. as a part-time body.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Stearns amendment (A013) Failed by recorded vote: 108 - 315 (Roll no. 170).
